meanings.definition: A type of deer found in South Asia.
meanings.sent1: The sambars gracefully roamed the forest in search of food.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of sambars near the river while on a safari.
meanings.sent3: The sambars decided to have a picnic in the woods, but forgot the sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: The sambars moved through the trees like shadows, blending into the surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The majestic sambars with their antlers stood proudly in the clearing.

meanings.definition: A type of spicy Indian soup or stew made with lentils and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: My mom cooked a delicious sambars for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of the sambars filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.
meanings.sent3: When I tasted the sambars, my taste buds did a happy dance.
meanings.sent4: The hot sambars warmed me up on a cold winter evening.
meanings.sent5: The flavorful sambars had just the right amount of spice to tickle my tongue.
